Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Helped me with transcribing lectures and making use of notes for key ideas, explaining terminology.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI was alot more concise than tutors made me feel more reassured in my work and helped with my creativity beyond the restrictions from what I thought would be the right thing to what was the right thing + extra.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI told me what i was missing according to the marking criteria whereas tutors would either tell me im on the right track or far from it.
